backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining health check, authorization mixin, user profiles, master design mapping, orders, and comparison utilities.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two features, related source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their functionality for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, light/dark mode tokens, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the root React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, theme colors, and launch behavior.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Simple service worker implementing install, fetch cache, and cache cleanup for offline support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app router and bootstrap logic with authentication, profile loading, admin checks, and timeout handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen shown when a user lacks permission to access a page.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapEr: Error screen shown when profile or bootstrap loading fails, with retry and logout actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity and handles auth state and errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/NoProfileBl: Displays a pending-access screen for authenticated users without a profile and allows copying their principal ID.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Admin-only modal for initial setup that saves the admin's name and refreshes related queries.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: Restricts content to users with allowed roles and shows a loading spinner or access denied as needed.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: Catches application errors and shows a recovery UI with reload and logout options.
frontend/src/components/errors/ErrorDeta: Collapsible panel displaying technical error details with a copy-to-clipboard option.
frontend/src/components/errors/InlineErr: Inline error block with optional retry action and expandable technical details.
frontend/src/components/exports/ExportAc: Dropdown for exporting orders in various structured formats.
Main app layout with role-based navigation, mobile menu, and connectivity indicators.
frontend/src/components/masterDesigns/Ma: Dialog for adding or editing master design mappings and saving them via mutation.
Dialog component that handles file selection, parsing, summary calculation, and importing of master design entries.
Displays a table of master designs with edit and activate/deactivate actions.
frontend/src/components/orders/Ingestion: Renders a preview table of ingested orders, highlighting unmapped design codes and missing karigar names.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersFil: Provides filter controls for orders, including karigar, date range, CO-only, and status filters.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersTab: Shows a detailed orders table with optional status update controls and customer order highlighting.
frontend/src/components/status/BackendSt: Displays backend reachability status with refresh, error details, and optional canister ID reveal/copy.
frontend/src/components/status/Connectiv: Displays online/offline status and queued sync count, offering manual sync when online.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReachabilit: Periodically runs a backend health check and classifies errors to determine online/offline status.
frontend/src/hooks/useCopyToClipboard.ts: Provides clipboard copy function with temporary success/error status labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the current user profile using a safe actor and handles auth and bootstrap errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth client, login flow, stored identities, and related status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for CRUD operations on orders, master designs, and unmapped codes using a safe actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Builds an authenticated or anonymous actor with timeout and safe access-control initialization, caching it indefinitely.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/exports/ordersExport.ts: Exports orders to CSV, filtering by type and generating a downloadable file.
frontend/src/lib/mapping/applyMasterDesi: Maps orders to master design entries using normalized codes and preserves meaningful karigar names.
frontend/src/lib/mapping/normalizeDesign: Normalizes design codes by trimming and collapsing whitespace.
frontend/src/lib/orders/deriveMetrics.ts: Computes aggregate order metrics including totals and karigar-wise breakdowns.
frontend/src/lib/orders/formatKarigarNam: Formats karigar names, returning 'Unassigned' for empty values.
Detects customer orders by checking if the order type contains 'co'.
frontend/src/lib/orders/sortOrdersDesign: Sorts orders by normalized design code and then by order number.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseMast: Parses master design mappings from an Excel workbook using flexible column matching.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseOrde: Parses order rows from an Excel workbook, validating required fields and converting types.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/readWorkb: Loads SheetJS if needed and reads an Excel file into a workbook object with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/masterDesignPar: Parses master design files from PDF or Excel, delegating to format-specific parsers.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/orderParser.ts: Parses order files from PDF or Excel, routing to the appropriate parser based on file type.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/extractText: Loads PDF.js from CDN and extracts structured text lines from each PDF page.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/parseMaster: Parses flattened PDF text lines into master design entries by detecting headers and splitting row data.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/parseOrders: Parses order rows from PDF text while tracking karigar/factory headers and constructing Order objects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/offline/db.ts: Implements IndexedDB storage for orders, master designs, sync queue, and metadata.
frontend/src/offline/sync.ts: React hook that syncs queued offline ingestions with the backend and updates local query cache.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard that displays orders, metrics, date filtering, and error/loading states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/MasterDesignsPa: Displays master design mappings with search, add, import, and edit functionality using dialogs and a table.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UserManagementP: Provides a form to create user profiles by principal ID with validation, role selection, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/karigar/KarigarDashbo: Shows a karigar's assigned orders with summary metrics and a table, using derived metrics and sorted data.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: UI page rendering the login screen with branding and a signâ€‘in button.
frontend/src/pages/setup/BootstrapAdminP: Handles initial admin bootstrap by accepting a token, storing it, reinitializing actors, and redirecting.
frontend/src/pages/staff/IngestOrdersPag: Allows staff to upload and parse order files, apply master design mappings, preview results, and handle mapping or parse errors.
frontend/src/pages/staff/StaffDashboardP: Enables staff to view, filter, sort, export, and navigate to ingest orders, displaying all orders in a table.
frontend/src/pages/staff/UnmappedDesignC: React page that lists unmapped design codes grouped from fetched orders, supports searching, and opens a form dialog to add mappings.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on window load and logs success or failure.
frontend/src/utils/bootstrapErrorClassif: Classifies errors into stopped-canister, network, or generic types and extracts canister IDs for diagnostics.
frontend/src/utils/errorPresentation.ts: Generates user-friendly error messages using bootstrap error classification and provides helpers for stopped-canister errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout, rejecting if it exceeds a specified duration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, plugins, colors, fonts, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Tracks overall project state, architecture notes, issues, and features for the KarigarFlow system.
